name: Psychic Detective
description: Enter the mind-altering life of psychic Eric Fox. In this first thriller of a case - Black Diamond - you head-trip into a sinister, extrasensory-enhanced world, trying to solve the mystery behind the madness. Creep around in the lives and minds of the people you meet to discover their bizarre relationships and evil agendas. Interpret the clues you find in the retrocognitive flashes you receive. Throw your psychic weight around to get what you want. But - be careful - hop into the wrong heads, and you could wind up a shambling idiot.
